Section.name: About ACE
Section.description:
Aditya College of Engineering, Andhra Pradesh- Chittoor, is created in the year 2009 with four building extensions in particular Computer Science, Electronics and correspondences, Mechanical and Electrical and Electronics Engineering. It is located 10km from the heart of Madanapalle city towards Punganur Street. It has a highly qualified, commitment showing staff. Sports, Cultural Activities, and other advancement exercises are given prime vitality for general improvement of the understudies.The college has a vision to offer value based Technical Education, Training, Consultancy, Research & Development, and to offer state of art infrastructure to get pool of technical education.
Facts & Figures of Aditya College of Engineering- Andhra Pradesh- Chittoor
Founded in
2009
Head of the Institution
Dr. S. Ramalinga Reddy
Approved and Affiliated
AICTE and JNTUA, Anantapur
Different courses
CSE, CCE, EEE, MEC, Civil Engineering.
Location
10km from the heart of Madanapalle city towards Punganur road.
Student intake
120 students in Computer Science & Engineering and Electronics & Communications Engineering and 60 students in Mechanical, Civil and Electrical & Electronics Engineering branches.
Why join Adiya College of Engineering- Andhra Pradesh- Chittoor?
Excellent Technical Education: The college authority ensures to offer quality technical education through well- experienced faculty.
Extra-curricular Activities: College also ensures to prepare students physically along with mentally by conducting sports tournaments along with orientation.

ACE, AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024.Courses: B.Tech Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
